message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we're discussing is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for you, worth $15,000 based on your needs and expectations. I am offering this unique asset to you at a special price, aiming to make this deal mutually beneficial. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a high-quality product while allowing me to achieve a fair return for my investment. I believe this offer strikes the right balance between value and affordability. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together.
